title: Set primary site URL to prasadenterprise.caffeine.xyz and remove draft/www URL references

requirements.summary: Set SITE_CONFIG.url to the canonical non-www production URL and remove any draft/www URL references from user-facing UI copy, links, and metadata derived from SITE_CONFIG.
acceptanceCriteria: frontend/src/config/site.ts sets SITE_CONFIG.url to exactly "https://prasadenterprise.caffeine.xyz" (no www).
A project-wide search finds no occurrences of "significant-blush-1gq-draft.caffeine.xyz" in frontend source code or user-facing text.
A project-wide search finds no occurrences of "https://www.prasadenterprise.caffeine.xyz" used as the primary site URL in frontend source code or user-facing text.
Any UI element or link that intentionally represents the siteâ€™s primary URL (if present) uses "https://prasadenterprise.caffeine.xyz".

file_operations.description: Update SITE_CONFIG.url to exactly "https://prasadenterprise.caffeine.xyz" (no "www", no trailing slash) and ensure no other SITE_CONFIG-derived metadata/constants embed the draft or www variant.

Audit footer content for any user-facing references to the primary site URL; ensure any intentional display/link uses SITE_CONFIG.url (canonical non-www). Remove any unused SITE_CONFIG import if the footer does not display the site URL.
Audit static document metadata for any hardcoded references to the draft URL or www variant; update/remove them so the app does not display or reference those URLs in user-facing metadata.
